Lyric:
[by:不听歌的码农不是好厨子]
[00:08.149]Maybe I'm selfish, call me see through
[00:10.200]But I'm debating if I really need to
[00:12.370]Tie tie to someone forever
[00:14.210]Sure I get lonely sometimes, I miss being together

[00:16.309]But when, when I roam from city to city
[00:18.270]With the highway and the crowds, and the hunger that's in me
[00:20.520]Fill me up with fireworks and tell me I'm skinny
[00:22.750]Soak up the fire and the buzz they give me

[00:24.846]Oo oo oo oo oo
[00:28.434]Long nights, stay up late
[00:30.562]Drink the sky, meditate

[00:32.573]Oo oo oo oo oo
[00:36.612]Open eyes, sunroof
[00:38.684]Give me miles, give me truth

[00:42.536]Sometimes I get high, sometimes I get low
[00:46.750]But I'm calm as can be in a room full of strangers
[00:50.610]But oh my, don't try to get close
[00:54.960]I'm just gonna leave, 'cause baby I'm a lone ranger

[00:59.744]Na na na na na, na na na na na na, na na na na na na
[01:05.444]I'm a lone ranger

[01:07.852]I'm a lion, I'm a tiger
[01:09.868]I'm a caged bird, I'm on fire
[01:11.880]Got these paper wings, but they don't hold the egg
[01:13.949]Get so close to somebody but I don't stay there

[01:15.997]Much less brave than I admit
[01:17.837]Much more scared than they all think
[01:20.101]But I'm protecting this organ in my chest
[01:21.963]'Cause the blood sweat and tears they can make quite a mess

[01:24.002]Oo oo oo oo oo
[01:28.026]Open eyes, open roof
[01:30.041]Give me miles, give me truth

[01:33.561]Sometimes I get high, sometimes I get low
[01:38.041]But I'm calm as can be in a room full of strangers
[01:42.293]But oh my, don't try to get close
[01:46.273]I'm just gonna leave, 'cause baby I'm a lone ranger

[01:51.029]Na na na na na, na na na na na na, na na na na na na
[01:56.405]'Cause baby I'm a lone ranger
